name: Framed Hardstone Panel
description: Framed Hardstone Panel; Unknown; Florence, Tuscany, Italy; about 1970; hardware and ancient stone 17th century; Frames: ebony; Panels: porphyry rosso di Egitto in the center surrounded by (clockwise from the top) broccatello di Siena marble, breccia di San Bernardo, africano marble, serpentino marble or porphyry verde di Grecia, bianca e nero d'Aquitania marble, porphyry bigio a morviglione, breccia oolitica, and granite della sedia di San Lorenzo; 77.5 cm (30 1/2 in.); 95.SE.57.3; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
